channel.title: [508] - How i make Safe Zone?
channel.description: Guys i have tryied to figure out how to make a place Safe zone and i still dont know. I have tryed to figure this out in 1 week now. And nobdy is helping me with this. Please someone does know how to make a place Safe Zone like ::pvp make it Safe Zone so when you die you dont lose the item. If i make ::pvp safe zone is it like this on all place or what?
